english.segment1: Do you want me back again. Cause i'm only doing time. Take me home again. Cause you're always on my mind
english.segment2: The more I buy of life I find. The more I fall behind. As precious as the time may feel. It's always passing by
english.segment3: Could you take me over there. If i leave my load behind. I can meet you anywhere. I'm not that hard to find
english.segment4: The more I buy of life I find. The more I fall behind. As precious as the time may feel. It's always passing by. When I give all I have to you. Watch me start to fly
english.segment5: If you want me. If you want me back again. I could leave this senseless. World behind me
english.segment6: The more I buy of life I find. The more I fall behind. As precious as the time may feel. It's always passing by. When I give all I have to you. Watch me start to fly
